choices.data-googlemap-scrollzoom: Map is zoomable via scroll wheel

sub_fields.label: Source Video ID
sub_fields.name: video_id
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter the video ID for your hosting service. You can extract the video ID from your URL. It is usually the last component of the URL path. Examples:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/embed/lasWefVUCsI - your video ID is lasWefVUCsI
Vimeo: https://player.vimeo.com/video/40653230 - your video ID is 40653230
